channel.title: PI Skills disconnect
channel.description:
I had my first public release of my server awhile ago and a number of people come to me complaining about some bugs... the bugs that concerned me most were that
[ul][li]smithing[/li] [li]fishing[/li] [li]fletching[/li][/ul]
and some more skills disconnected you whenever you tried to train them. does anyone have a fix?

item.title: PI Skills disconnect
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

Fridder:

Would it disconnect you when you leveled up? I had a problem like that on my old Allstar.

no. when you try train them…when you use the ore with the furnace or the bar with the anvil or whatever…

Read full topic
